hadith.en:
I was sitting in the company of the poor members of the emigrants. Some of them were sitting together because of lack of clothing while a reader was reciting to us. All of a sudden the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) came along and stood beside us. When the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) stood, the reader stopped and greeted him.  





He asked: What were you doing?  We said: Messenger of Allah! We had a reader who was reciting to us and we were listening to the Book of Allah, the Exalted.  





The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) then said: Praise be to Allah Who has put among my people those with whom I have been ordered to stay. The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) then sat among us so as to be like one of us, and when he had made a sign with his hand they sat in a circle with their faces turned towards him.
